replies.body:
League of onions you say?
no wonder league's main export is gallons of salty player tears.
Logged in just to upvote this
Onion can be a champion.... But graves cant have his cigar? {{champion:104}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Can't believe you're still talking about that.
hajrudin can be mad, but graves can't have a cigar? {{champion:104}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
League players can spam "But graves can't have his cigar", but graves can't have his cigar? {{champion:104}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
League players can spam "But graves can't have his cigar", but graves can't have his cigar? but graves cant have his cigar
Graves can't have a cigar but meme obsessed players can't have a brain?
{{champion:9}} I haven't got a brain, and soon, neither will you!
{{champion:9}} The sum of the square roots of any two sides of an isosceles triangle is equal to the square root of the remaining side!
Congrats you took 8th grade math
anyone else worried about the computer's well being
its covered in plastic wrap.. look closely{{champion:64}}
the computer can be covered in plastic wrap but graves can have a cigar{{champion:104}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
"Jesse, we need to cook."
Indeed, after seeing those Hazmat suits my first thought also went to Breaking Bad. New Singed skin, anyone?
Or a Singed skin where his gas is the smell of onions...
Shrek singed, yells get out of my lab when he throws someone.
Walt Jr Breakfast!
Kids in Africa could have eaten those onions
They could have drank his tears too.  {{item:3151}}
{{champion:41}} *eats onion* {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:41}} damnit...thought this was an orange...{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} onions aren't K...
"I am the Danger! I am; the one who chops!... Onions."
siegmeyer of catarina new champ or parody skin? (Dark Souls 1 reference >.>)

replies.body: Logged on to upvote. #sunbro
Damn straight. #PraiseIt
Jolly Cooperation! #grosslyincandescant
Or a new{{champion:17}} Skin!
{{champion:17}} deserves excommunication

Have a story about a time when you triumphed over League against immeasurable odds? Post below!


i played a game and i had a taric on my team

i played a game and i had a taric on my team

i was the taric
Play while eating chile peppers until the end :)
If not chile peppers, wasabi, hotsauce, or something weaker.
why not something stronger?
Have him start with a fresh jalapeño if he dies eat another at 10 deaths eat a habenaro and if they lose he eats a ghost chile.
So much yes... So much...
They can afford to just destroy a perfectly good gaming laptop like that?
But graves can't have his cigar?
Shrek would be proud

You want a story about immeasurable odds? How about me vs a team of {{champion:17}}{{champion:17}}{{champion:17}}{{champion:17}}{{champion:17}} in One For All.


Forget triumphing, I'm lucky I survived.
Believe me, nothing is more scary than a triple phantom dancer yi in urf
Was your team all Nasus?
the smell is quite nice {{champion:29}}
what a waste of onions.. u could've made so much yummy food with that. like onion rings. what a shame
onion rings are disgusting to me.
or they used tthose onions to make soup. or compost. or chopped onions. THE POSSIBILITIES ARE INFINATE
this video can not be in English, but {{champion:104}} can't have a cigar {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
